content: this gift card holder is cute enough to hang on the tree even after the money s been spent finished size 3 in width 4 in height time to complete 1 hour 20 minutes gauge 4 stitches x 4 row = 1 x 1 in single_crochet the finished product is intended to fit a standard gift card but the size is easily adjusted by adding or subtracting foundation chain in multiples of 2 plus 1 turning chain use this pattern in any way you like please just credit me for the design i want this pattern to be as clear and concise as possible so i welcome all suggestions for improvement thank you and happy crafting
